description: This fiery seafood pasta will become a firm favourite for an easy midweek dinner.
name: Spicy Prawn Arrabiata Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g king prawns, raw, peeled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pan of water to the boil and cook the penned for 8 minutes, drain and set aside.
In a large, deep pan on medium high heat, heat the oil and cook the leeks and eggplant for 5 minutes to soften. Add the garlic, chilli flakes and black olives and cook for 2 more minutes.
Add the passata, crumbled stock cube and 300ml of water to the saucepan and cook for 8-10 minutes to thicken.
Stir the prawns into the sauce and cook for 6 minutes or until pink and cooked through.
Add the penne back to the pan and cook for 1 more minute. Scatter with parsley and cracked black pepper and serve.
